item.title: LAB Implementing ML Agents in Unity 3D
item.description:
Building a Game AI with Unity ML-Agents: A Pong Post-Mortem Link to heading

Introduction Link to heading

Reinforcement learning in video games has fascinated developers since DeepMind demonstrated that AI could surpass humans at Atari games. Today, Unity ML-Agents makes this technology accessible to developers, allowing the creation of intelligent opponents without being a machine learning expert. In this article, I share my experience developing a Pong game with a trained AI, the challenges encountered, and the solutions found.

item.title: LAB Hugo Setup
item.description:
Introduction Link to heading

This guide presents the setup of a static blog with HUGO and its automatic deployment via GitHub Actions on GitHub Pages. This solution offers a modern, free, and fully automated workflow.

Process Overview Link to heading

The principle is simple: every time you push content to GitHub, an automatic action will compile your HUGO site and deploy it on GitHub Pages. You just write and push, the rest happens automatically!
